body.gathalast: Akkhobhaṃ amitaṃ bhogaṃ, ghare sannicitaṃ mama.
Saṃvijjanti ca me bhogā, dānaṃ dassāmi satthuno.
Tumbake ca karaṇḍe ca, kārayiṃ tadanucchave.
Dātabbaṃ nāma yaṃ atthi, yañca kappati satthuno.
Yadi sakkosi taṃ dukkhaṃ, vinodeyyāsi khattiya.
body.gatha1: ‘‘‘Tava dukkhaṃ mama dukkhaṃ, ubhinnaṃ ekato manomanaṃ ;
body.gathalast: Pahu samāno gajjasu, ekaṃ te duccajaṃ varaṃ.
Etehi yadi te attho, dassāmi avikampito.
body.gatha1: ‘‘‘Gajjitaṃ kho tayā deva, micchā taṃ bahu gajjitaṃ;
body.gathalast: Kiṃ te me pīḷitenattho, patthitaṃ te kathehi me.
Bhojayissāmi sambuddhaṃ, vajjaṃvañcuṃ me māhu jīvitaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘‘Aññaṃ tehaṃ varaṃ dammi, mā yācittho tathāgataṃayācito tathāgato ;
body.gathalast: Adeyyo kassaci buddho, maṇi jotiraso yathā.
Na me paṭissuto buddho, varassu amitaṃ dhanaṃ.
Sudinno hoti me buddho, chindatha saṃsayaṃ mama.
Sammā mayhampi deyyātha, puna buddhaṃ labhāmahaṃ.
Campakaṃ candanaṃ (ka.) nāgapupphañca, maṇḍapaṃ kārayiṃ ahaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘‘Hatthī assā rathā pattī, senā ca caturaṅginī;
body.gathalast: Gotamo nāma gottena nāmena (sabbattha) evamuparipi; aṭṭhathāyaṃ pana pubbe gottenātipadaṃ vaṇṇitaṃ, satthā loke bhavissati.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Satasahasse kataṃ kammaṃ, phalaṃ dassesi me idha;
body.gathalast: Sumutto saravegova, kilese jhāpayī mama jhāpayissati (sī. ka.), jhāpayiṃ ahaṃ (syā.).
Yattha kāraṃ karitvāna, pattomhi acalaṃ padaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Anūnakaṃ dānavaraṃ, adāsi yo so (ka.) hi māṇavo;
‘‘Chatte ca sugate datvāchatte sugate datvāna , saṅghe gaṇavaruttame;
‘‘Sītaṃ uṇhaṃ na jānāmi, rajojallaṃ na limpati;
body.gathalast: Anupaddavo anīti ca, homi apacito sadā.
Imaṃ jātiṃ ṭhapetvāna, matthake dhārayanti me.
Siniddhaṃ hoti me gattaṃ, bhave saṃsarato mama.
Lābhī annassa pānassa, vatthassa sayanassa ca.
Chāyā yathāpi rukkhassa, sabbattha na jahanti maṃ.
Pasannacitto datvāna, buddhe saṅghe tatheva ca.
Vajirena samaṃ ñāṇaṃ, tesaṃ nissandato labhe.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Dāsidāsedāsidāsa gavasse ca, bhatake nāṭake ārakkhake (sī.) bahū;
‘‘Sītaṃ uṇhaṃ na jānāmi, pariḷāho na vijjati;
body.gathalast: Sabbaggī nibbutā mayhaṃ, tassa nissandato mama.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Satthena vā visena vā, vihesampi na kubbate;
body.gathalast: Ime guṇe paṭilabhe, tassa nissandato ahaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Saddhamme gādhaṃ cetoñāṇaṃ ca (sī.) vindāmi, sarāmi dutiyaṃ bhavaṃ;
body.gathalast: Sabbattha succhavī homi, tassa nissandato ahaṃ.
Devaloke manusse vā, anubandhā ime guṇā.
Pañcavaṇṇehi dāyādo pañcavaṇṇe bhayābhāvo (syā.), acalo homi kenaci.
Dhatā ṭhitā (ka.) me na vinassanti, bhavanti suvinicchitā.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Bhariyā dāsadāsī sabbatthapi evameva dissati ca, hatthissarathapattike;
body.gathalast: Ime guṇe paṭilabhe, tassa nissandato ahaṃ.
body.gatha2: Anupaddavo anīti ca, homi apacito sadā;
body.gathalast: Na me piyaviyogatthi, tassa nissandato mama.
Ime guṇe paṭilabhe, tassa nissandato ahaṃ.
Siniddhaṃ hoti me gattaṃ, rajojallaṃ na limpati;
Ime guṇe paṭilabhe, tassa nissandato ahaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Puttā mayhaṃ bahū honti, tāso mayhaṃ na vijjati;
body.gathalast: Khalitampikhalitaṃ maṃ na jānāmi, abhantaṃ mānasaṃ mama.
Ime guṇe paṭilabhe, tassa nissandato ahaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Sati me ujukā hoti, susambandhā ca nhāravo;
body.gathalast: Ime guṇe paṭilabhe, tassa nissandato ahaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Tumbake ca karaṇḍe ca, datvā buddhe gaṇuttame;
‘‘Vipule ca guṇe lābhī, samāva calanā mama;
body.gathalast: Tāni me na vinassanti, tumbadāne idaṃ phalaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Malaharaṇiyo añjananāḷiyo (sī.), hatthalilaṅgake (syā. pī.), hatthalilaṅgate (ka.) datvā, buddhe saṅghe gaṇuttame;
‘‘Natthuke thavike (?) bhesajjathaviketi hi pubbe vuttaṃ sugate datvā, saṅghe gaṇavaruttame;
body.gathalast: Sutaṃ cāgañca khantiñca, paññaṃ me aṭṭhamaṃ guṇaṃ.
Sabbe maṃ apacāyanti, kitti abbhuggatā mama.
Varapotthake kambale ca, labhāmi vividhe ahaṃ.
Tesu ñāṇaṃ uppādetvāñāṇaṃ upadahitvāna , vihare sabbadā ahaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Sīlaṃ samādhi paññā ca, vimutti ca anuttarā;
body.gathalast: Tesu ñāṇaṃ uppādetvāñāṇaṃ upadahitvāna , viharāmi sukhaṃ ahaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Dāsī dāsā ca bhariyā, ye caññe anujīvino;
body.gatha2: Lābhī annassa pānassa, sūro paññāṇavā sadā;
body.gathalast: Ime guṇe paṭilabhe, saṃsaranto bhave ahaṃ.
Tasseva vāhasā dāni, patto santisukhaṃ sivaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Svāgataṃ vata me āsi, mama buddhassa santikebuddhaseṭṭhassa santike ;
body.gathalast: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
body.paragraph: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā pilindavaccho thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘‘Uggā ca rājaputtā ca, vesiyānā ca brāhmaṇā;
‘‘‘Āḷārikā kappakā āḷārikā ca sūdā (syā.) ca, nhāpakā mālakārakā;
‘‘‘Gaṇikā kumbhadāsī ca, pūvikā sūpikā (ka.) macchikāpi ca;
‘‘Te me sutvāna vacanaṃ, gaṇaṃ bandhiṃsu tāvade;
‘‘‘Ime tīṇi satā vīra, purisā ekato gaṇā;
body.gathalast: Tiṇṇaṃ satānaṃ purato, imā gāthā abhāsatha.
Pacchime bhave sampatte, vāseṭṭho nāma brāhmaṇo.
Selo iti mama nāmaṃ, chaḷaṅge pāramiṃ gato.
‘Āvāho vā vivāho vā, rājā vā te nimantito’.
Na nimantemi rājānaṃ, āhutī me na vijjati.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Na catthi mayhamāvāho, vivāho me na vijjati;
body.gathalast: So me nimantito ajja, tassetaṃ paṭiyādanaṃ.
Vijjūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
Sīhūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
Nāgūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
Usabhūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
Sakkūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Vasī gaṇī patāpī ca, tejassī ca durāsado;
body.gathalast: Brahmūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
Dharaṇūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
Udadhūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
Nerūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
Gaganūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
Assāsako mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
Ratanākaro mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
Meghūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
Sūriyūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
Candūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
Appameyyo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
Vimutti asadisā yassa, so me buddho nimantito.
Yassa parakkamo jeṭṭho, so me buddho nimantito.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Rāgo doso ca moho ca, visā sabbe samūhatā;
body.gathalast: Agadūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
Vejjūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
Buddho buddhoti sutvāna, pīti me udapajjatha.
body.gatha1: ‘‘‘Kahaṃ nu kho so bhagavā, lokajeṭṭho narāsabho;
body.gathalast: Gāvī yathā vacchagiddhā, evāhaṃ viciniṃ jinaṃ.
Mattova kuñjaro dantī, evaṃ buddhā durāsadā.
body.gatha1: ‘‘‘Yaṃ so deseti sambuddho saddhammaṃ (sī. syā.), khemaṃ nibbānapattiyā;
body.gathalast: Buddhoti niṭṭhaṃ gantvāna, saha sissehi pabbajiṃ.
Tena kammena sukatena, aṭṭha hetū labhāmahaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Disāsu pūjito homi, bhogā ca amitā mama;
body.gathalast: Patiṭṭhā homi sabbesaṃ, tāso mama na vijjati.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Byādhayo me na vijjanti, dīghāyuṃ pālayāmi ca;
body.gathalast: Sukhumacchaviko homi, āvāse patthite vaseāvāse patte vasseāvāseva ṭhite vase .
Tena kammena sukatena, pañca hetū labhāmahaṃ.
Ādeyyavacano homi, na dhaṃsemi yathā ahaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Abhantaṃ hoti me cittaṃ, akhilo homi kassaci;
body.gathalast: Tena kammena sukatena, vimalo homi sāsane.
Sāvako te mahāvīra, bhikkhu taṃ vandate muni.
Tena kammena sukatena, pañca hetū labhāmahaṃ.
Sabbasampattiko homi, maccheraṃ me na vijjati.
Sabbābhiññābalappatto, thero selo (?) vandati taṃ muni.
Tena kammena sukatena, pāvisiṃ abhayaṃ puraṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Ye keci damakā loke, hatthiasse damenti ye;
body.gathalast: Karitvā kāraṇā nānā, dāruṇena damenti te.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Svāgataṃ vata me āsi…pe… kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
body.paragraph: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā selo sapariso bhagavato santike imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
body.gathalast: Ñāṇālokena jotesi, nāvaṭaṃ pavaraṃ (syā.), vajira (pī.) ñāṇamuttamaṃ.
Antojālikatā jālagatā (sī.) pāṇā, pīḷitā honti tāvade.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Tatheva titthiyā loke, puthupāsaṇḍanissitā mūḷhā saccavinissaṭā (syā.), muṭṭhasaccavinissaṭā (ka.);
body.gathalast: Asamo susamo santosusīlo asamo santopaññavā yuttacāgo ca , vasī tādī jitañjayo.
Vanditvā satthuno pāde, tuṇhī aṭṭhāsahaṃ tadā.
Bhikkhusaṅghe ṭhito satthā, imā gāthā abhāsatha.
body.gatha1: ‘‘‘Yo me sīlañca ñāṇañca, saddhammañcāpi vaṇṇayidhammañcāpi pakittayi ;
body.gathalast: Tatheva tvaṃ mahāvīra, dhammena tappayī mamaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Aho nūna sa bhagavā, ciraṃ tiṭṭheyya cakkhumā;
body.gathalast: Aññātañca vijāneyyuṃ, phuseyyuṃ aññātañcāpi jāneyya, passeyya (ka.) amataṃ padaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Ayaṃ me pacchimā jāti, bhavā sabbe samūhatā;
‘‘Svāgataṃ vata me āsi…pe… kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
body.paragraph: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā sabbakittiko thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘‘Yo taṃ adāsi madhuṃ me, pasanno sehi pāṇibhi;
body.gathalast: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Vuṭṭhamhi deve caturaṅgule tiṇe, sampupphitesupupphite dharaṇīruhe sañchanne vappadese (syā.);
body.gathalast: Suññe ghare maṇḍaparukkhamūlake, vasāmi niccaṃ sukhito anāsavo.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Majjhe mahante hīne ca majjhe mayhaṃ bhavā assu (syā. pī. ka.), bhave sabbe atikkamiṃye bhave samatikkamiṃyo bhavesu pakittayi ;
body.gathalast: Ajja me āsavā khīṇā, natthi dāni punabbhavo.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Svāgataṃ vata me āsi…pe… kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
body.paragraph: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā madhudāyako thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Migaluddo pure āsiṃ, araññe vipine (sī.), irine (syā. ka.) kānane ahaṃ;
body.gathalast: Bhikkhusaṅghe ca sampatte, gāthā pabyāharīsabyāharīmābyāharī jino.
body.gatha1: ‘‘‘Yo maṃ sattāhaṃ pūjesi, āvāsañca akāsi me;
body.gathalast: Tato pupphamaye byamhe, dhārentepupphamayaṃ byamhaṃ, dhārentaṃ nikkhamissati.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Cīvare piṇḍapāte ca, cetanā me na vijjati;
‘‘Idha passāmi idhaddasāsiṃ (sī.) sambuddhaṃ, anomaṃ nāma cakkhumaṃ;
body.gathalast: Tassa dhammaṃ suṇitvāna, pattomhi acalaṃ padaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Svāgataṃ vata me āsi…pe… kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
body.paragraph: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā padumakūṭāgāriyo thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
body.gathalast: Kapitthā ca bahū tattha, pupphitā jīvajīvakā campakā nāgaketakā (syā.).
Phārusakā alābū ca, puṇḍarīkā ca pupphitā.
Mahānāmā bahū tattha, ajjunā ca piyaṅgukā.
Ediso assamo mayhaṃ, sasissohaṃ tahiṃ vasiṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘‘Yo me pādāsi bhesajjaṃ, byādhiñca samayī mama;
body.gathalast: Vādite tūriye tattha, modissati sadā ayaṃ.
Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
Bākulobakkulo nāma nāmena, hessati satthu sāvako.
Khepetuṃ neva sakkomi, tadā hi sukataṃ mama.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Lābhā mama suladdhaṃ me, yohaṃ addakkhi nāyakaṃ;
‘‘Svāgataṃ vata me āsi…pe… kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
body.gathalast: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā bākulobakkulo thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti;
Mātā pitā matā bhātā, ekacitamhimātā pitā ca bhātā ca, ekacitakamhi ḍayhare.
Cittakkhepo ca me āsi, tena sokena aṭṭito.
Yathāgatā tathā gatā, tattha kā paridevanā.
Evaṃ mātā pitā tuyhaṃ, tattha kā paridevanā.
Evaṃ mātā pitā tuyhaṃ, tattha kā paridevanā.
body.gatha1: ‘‘‘Yathāpi urago jiṇṇaṃ, hitvā gacchati saṃ tacaṃ saṃtanuṃ (syā. ka.);
body.gathalast: Evaṃ mātā pitā tuyhaṃ, saṃ tanuṃ idha hīyare’.
Sabbe satte uddharasi, ñāṇena tvaṃ mahāmune.
Paṭipādesi me maggaṃ, tava ñāṇena cakkhuma.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Paṭipannā ca sekhā ca, phalaṭṭhā santi sāvakā;
‘‘Mahāsamuddovakkhobho, atulopi yathā samuddo akkhobho, atulo ca (sī.) duruttaro;
‘‘Svāgataṃ vata me āsi…pe… kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
body.paragraph: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā girimānando thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
body.gathalast: Gahetvā saḷalaṃ mālaṃ, maṇḍapaṃ kārayiṃ ahaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Divā vā yadi vā rattiṃ, caṅkamanto ṭhito cahaṃ;
‘‘Svāgataṃ vata me āsi…pe… kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
body.paragraph: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā saḷalamaṇḍapiyo thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
body.gathalast: Nadī ca sandate tattha, supatitthā manoramā.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Lābhā amhaṃ suladdhaṃ no, ye vasāma tavantike;
‘‘Yo me annena pānena, sabbe ime ca tappayiṃ;
body.gathalast: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
Citake chattaṃ dhārenti, heṭṭhā chattamhi ḍayhatha’.
Maṇḍape rukkhamūle vā, santāpo me na vijjati.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Svāgataṃ vata me āsi…pe… kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
body.paragraph: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā sabbadāyako thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Nāhaṃ addakkhiṃ passāmi (?) sambuddhaṃ, napi saddaṃ suṇomahaṃ;
body.gathalast: Mama bhakkhaṃ gavesanto, āhiṇḍāmi vane ahaṃ tadā (sī.).
Disvāna cittamāpajjivittimāpajjiṃcittamāpajjiṃ , satto ko nāmayaṃ bhave.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Tesaṃ yathā taṃ vacanaṃ, ayaṃ buddho bhavissati;
body.gathalast: Dīpaṃ buddhassa pādāsiṃ, pasanno sehi pāṇibhi.
Buddhassa ānubhāvena, āgacchuṃ buddhasantikaṃupagacchuṃ tadā jinaṃ .
body.gatha1: ‘‘‘Yo me dīpaṃ padīpesi, pasanno sehi pāṇibhi;
‘‘‘Divā vā yadi vā rattiṃ, padīpaṃ dhārayissati;
body.gathalast: Upapajjati yaṃ yoniṃ, devattaṃ atha mānusaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘‘Asseva dīpadānassa, aṭṭhadīpaphalena hi; upaṭṭhissantimaṃ jantuṃ (syā.), aṭṭha dīpā phalena hi; na jahissanti’maṃ jantuṃ (?) aṭṭhadīpaphalena hi;
body.gathalast: Na jayissantimaṃ jantūaṭṭhadīpaphalena hi; upaṭṭhissantimaṃ jantuṃaṭṭha dīpā phalena hi; na jahissanti’maṃ jantuṃ , dīpadānassidaṃ phalaṃ.
Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
Ajito nāma nāmena, hessati satthu sāvako’.
Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Svāgataṃ vata me āsi…pe… kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
body.paragraph: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā ajito thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
body.gatha1: Sabbado ajito ceva, gāthāyo gaṇitā iha;
body.gathalast: Satāni pañca gāthānaṃ, vīsati ca taduttarīti.
body.gatha1: Avaṭañca pilindi evameva dissati ca, gāthāyo gaṇitā iha;
